forecastday.title: Tuesday

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Low 52F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning becoming a steady light rain in the afternoon. High 16C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional light rain in the afternoon. High 63F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 13C. Winds SSE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 56F. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday

forecastday.fcttext: Rain and wind. High 63F. Winds S at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 57F. S winds at 15 to 25 mph, decreasing to 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday

forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 67F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday

forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High around 65F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 12C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low around 55F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A shower or two around the area in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 16C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Chance of a shower or two during the morning, followed by partly cloudy skies in the afternoon. High 64F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.
